statements: SELECT * FROM pharmacogenomic_data;
SELECT medication_name, response_type FROM pharmacogenomic_data WHERE dosage > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT genetic_variant FROM pharmacogenomic_data;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM pharmacogenomic_data ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmacogenomic_data WHERE response_type = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM pharmacogenomic_data WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT medication_name, genetic_variant, dosage FROM pharmacogenomic_data WHERE response_type = 'Positive' ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT genetic_variant, response_type FROM pharmacogenomic_data WHERE dosage > 100 GROUP BY genetic_variant, response_type;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM pharmacogenomic_data WHERE dosage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage, MAX(dosage) AS max_dosage, MIN(dosage) AS min_dosage FROM pharmacogenomic_data WHERE response_type = 'Negative';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, patient_name FROM Medications JOIN Patients ON Medications.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications JOIN Patients ON Medications.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY medication_name
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(medication_id) AS medication_count FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name ORDER BY medication_count DESC
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE administration_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT treatment_id, patient_id FROM treatments WHERE treatment_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT patient_name, genetic_data FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT p.patient_name, m.medication_name, t.treatment_date FROM patients p JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id JOIN medications m ON t.medication_id = m.medication_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_treatments FROM treatments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT patient_name, AGE, JSON_EXTRACT(genetic_data, '$.gene1') AS gene1 FROM patients WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(genetic_data, JSON_OBJECT('gene1', 'A'), '$.genes');
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM Treatments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_class FROM Medications;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, side_effects FROM Medications WHERE drug_class = 'Antibiotic';
SELECT * FROM Treatments ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gene_name, effect FROM Patients JOIN GenomicData ON Patients.patient_id = GenomicData.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE frequency > 3 ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, gene_type FROM Genes WHERE gene_type='Mutation' ORDER BY gene_name;
SELECT treatment_id, patient_id, medication_id, date_prescribed FROM Treatments ORDER BY date_prescribed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT gene_name, gene_type FROM Genes WHERE gene_type='Genetic';
SELECT * FROM Results JOIN Treatments ON Results.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
